thread.title: 'Mourning' dad appears for undertaker wife's murder
thread.title_full: 'Mourning' dad appears for undertaker wife's murder | News24

author: news24.com
title: 'Mourning' dad appears for undertaker wife's murder
text:
Port Elizabeth â€“ The husband of slain undertaker Roseline Bosman made his first appearance in a packed Humansdorp Magistrate Court on Wednesday, as shocked family members looked on.
Roseline, 45, and Daniel Bosman, 49, had been in the process of divorcing and were not on speaking terms, their 25-year-old son Branwyne told News24.
Branwyne was in Cape Town when his younger brother Edwin, a matric pupil, found their mother's body in bed at their Humansdorp home on Saturday morning.
She had no external injuries, but Edwin said the place was in a mess.
